name: heroic-advancement
contents:
# Alternate Advancement beyond level 10

Paths of talents along these lines:
- Evolution of Ancestry
- Higher numbers
- Magic items
- Improvement of secondary stats
- Development of primary stat abilities (not necessarily pushing the number higher)



# Ancestry Evolved
bodyHtml:
Alternate Advancement beyond level 10

Paths of talents along these lines:

  • Evolution of Ancestry
  • Higher numbers
  • Magic items
  • Improvement of secondary stats
  • Development of primary stat abilities (not necessarily pushing the number higher)

Ancestry Evolved
